name: khi stephens
coverLetter: I use to work at a medical marijuana dispensary, as a bud-tender, for 7 months before they went out of business. As a bud-tender if we were not working with customers we were trimming bud and constantly making pre roll joints. I have trimmed over a 100 different strands of bud. Indica, Hybrid, Sativa... you name it, I've trimmed it. Lol
